pkgmetadata.longdescription: This module provides ctypes-based bindings (see http://wiki.videolan.org/PythonBinding) for the native libvlc API (see http://wiki.videolan.org/LibVLC) of the VLC video player. Note that it relies on an already present install of VLC. It has been automatically generated from the include files of vlc 3.0.20, using generator 1.23.
